message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Create release
steps.run:
TAG_NAME="${GITHUB_REF##refs/tags/}"
echo "See [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/${GITHUB_REPOSITORY}/blob/${TAG_NAME}/CHANGELOG.md) for more details." > ./release_notes.md
RELEASE_NAME="$(jq -r '.name' ./package.json)"
sed -i "1i${RELEASE_NAME} ${TAG_NAME}\n" ./release_notes.md
./bin/hub release create \
  --draft \
  --prerelease \
  --file ./release_notes.md \
  "${TAG_NAME}"
